articles.description: New England Patriots quarterback Cam Newton isn’t exactly burning out the scoreboard with passing statistics this season. However, Newton has been marginally better for the Patriots over the last two weeks with at least not turning the ball over with intercep…

articles.title: 'Mass incoming': Notre Dame AD addresses fan surge in Clemson post-game amid COVID-19 spike in area - USA TODAY
articles.description: Notre Dame limits seating to 20% capacity, tickets sold to students, faculty, staff, players' families. They are supposed to follow several protocols.
articles.content:
